october  

Scorpio Oct PERIOD 23Nov PERIOD 21Extra points for playing games in the rain last weekend PERIOD Too bad you lost them for not doing laundry your clothes are going to be brown and dingy for the rest of time PERIOD

Sagittarius Nov PERIOD 22Dec PERIOD 21Dont be that guy in your classes PERIOD At least do something that can be construed as class work or note taking PERIOD

Capricorn Dec PERIOD 22Jan PERIOD 19Be careful planning your Halloween costumes for this weekend PERIOD You dont want to be the one the stars are laughing at next week PERIOD

Aquarius Jan PERIOD 20Feb PERIOD 18When at a house party its probably a bad idea to drink that pitcher of KoolAid as though it were water  it definitely isnt PERIOD

Pisces Feb PERIOD 19March 20If you havent already gone through and detagged those pictures on Facebook from last weekend its probably time PERIOD

Aries March 21April 19Although it is possible for someone to jump over someone who is over  feet tall while shooting a basketball you should leave that to professionals and not try it at home PERIOD

Taurus April 20May 20All the new coffee flavors of the fall season are leading you to consume a few too many lattes each day PERIOD They may be delicious but theyre not worth being unable to sleep for days at a time PERIOD

Gemini May 21June 21The saturation of the media with political propaganda and smear ads has been diminished by baseball PERIOD Even Yankee and Red Sox fans can agree that this is a good thing PERIOD

Cancer June 22July 22While it may seem like a good idea to ride your skateboard down the hallway it isnt PERIOD And when you crack your head open your friends will laugh at you  a lot for a long time PERIOD

Leo July 23Aug PERIOD  All those careful calculations about whether going to class today is a better use of time than doing the work due later is a little premature PERIOD You should save your skips for later when you really need it PERIOD

Virgo Aug PERIOD 23Sept PERIOD 22Remember that time you had a dream about having children with your girlfriend Thats probably not something you want to tell her  especially via text PERIOD

Libra Sept PERIOD 23Oct PERIOD 22Warning Cup of Noodles is hot once youve prepared it PERIOD Dont fall asleep while holding it PERIOD You will burn your lap and stain your jeans PERIOD Not to mention youll still be hungry PERIOD
